SparePartPage.Heading: Spare parts
SparePartPage.Description: The sfkshop.gr provides you with original spare parts at unbeatable prices, fast and reliable repair and technical support services to a large number of IT products.
ProductReturnsPage.Heading: Return Procedures
ProductReturnsPage.ReturnPolicy.FirstCar: You have the right to return the products you bought within {days} calendar days from the date of receipt without cause at your own expense
ProductReturnsPage.ReturnProcedure.Step1: Send an email to info@sfkshop.gr or call 2106421065 to inform us about the problem you are facing in the product.
ProductReturnsPage.ReturnProcedure.Step2: Go to the nearest Courier store of your choice or call them to pick up your parcel. The return is at your own expense.
ProductReturnsPage.ReturnProcedure.Step3: Once the product is returned to our store and the appropriate check is made that the product is complete then you will be changed or a full refund of the cost of your order.
ProductReturnsPage.ShippingInfo.Heading: Shipping Information
ProductReturnsPage.ShippingInfo.Term1: * Our store does not bear any responsibility for how you will deliver the product to Courier
ProductReturnsPage.ReturnPolicy.Shipping: ** Our store does not accept charge of ours in case you return a product without cause or it is not problematic

ProductReturnsPage.MoneyBack.Term1: * Note in your package the IBAN and in which bank you want the refund to be made

FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Heading: Frequent questions
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Ans1: If you are a Facebook user, you can be served immediately, for any question you have , for our orders, products or services, through our Facebook page.
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section1.Qu: HOW CAN I COMMUNICATE WITH YOU?
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section1.An: The team of SFKshop.gr is by your side for everything you need.
Contact us daily in 3 different ways:
Filling in your details and request in the contact form you find here.
Calling us at telephone 21064 21065 (mobile and fixed) with local charge, from Monday to Friday 10am - 5pm
Chatting with us live through the live chat service from Monday - Friday 10: 00-17: 00.
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section1.Qu: HOW DO I MONITOR THE PROGRESS OF MY ORDER?
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section1.An: At any time you can see the stage where your order is here by logging in to your account and selecting 'order tracking' on the left side of the page!

Alternatively, you can see the stage of your order through the ACS Courier website here , the Elta Courier website here or ask us about the progress of your order in Live chat, by   phone, on facebook or send us an
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section2.An: Product availability is displayed on the product page.
The product can be:
Immediately available: Available for online purchase.
Delivery 1-3 working days: The product is available in our  central warehouses and will be available for shipment within    3 working days.
Delivery 4-10 working days : The product will be available for shipment in 4-10 working days.
Upon Order : It is available for pre-order and the delivery    date depends on the official delivery day from the official dealership. Priority order is observed.
Out of stock : Not available for order at this time.
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section2.Qu: HOW CAN I STORE PRODUCTS IN MY PROFILE?
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section2.An: You can keep products on your wish list so that you can find them easily and regardless of when and if you intend to get  them. The wish list is displayed to users
connected to the profile on all product pages marked 'favorites' and in the shopping cart.
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section2.Qu: HOW CAN I REGISTER MY ORDER?
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section2.An: You can keep products on your wish list so that you can find them easily and regardless of when and if you intend to get  them. The wish list is displayed to users
You can order the products you want in 3 simple ways!
1. By registering an online order 24 hours a day at  SFKshop.gr
2. Through the live chat that appears at the top of any  page!
Monday to Friday from 10:00 to 17:00
3. By phone order at 21064 21065 (from mobile * and landline)
Monday to Friday from 10:00 to 17:00 * (local charge)
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section2.Qu: HOW DO I KNOW IF MY ORDER HAS BEEN REGISTERED?
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section2.An: Upon successful completion of your order you will receive a  confirmation email with the summary of your purchase as well  as the order code.
In case you do not receive the confirmation email, most  likely:
• you have not completed your order
• you have entered the email incorrectly
• it has been transferred to spam
Your order has been registered ! You have received an email with the confirmation
Your order is being processed and soon you will be informed by email / sms about its progress!

Your order has been shipped . Your order has been sent via  ACS Courier or Elta Courier to be shipped to your place  within 3 working days! Your order has been invoiced and has  been delivered to the company ACS Courier or Elta Courierh will launch its shipment to your place!
Your order has arrived. Your order has been delivered to your place.
Your order has been canceled . The order was canceled
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section2.Qu: CAN I CHANGE / MODIFY / CANCEL MY ORDER?
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section2.An: Yes, by contacting us in one of the following ways
1. Through the live chat that appears at the bottom of SFKshop.gr!
Monday to Friday from 10:00 to 17:00
2. By phone at 21064 21065 (from mobile * and landline)
Monday to Friday from 10:00 to 17:00 * (local charge)
3. By email by filling out the contact form here
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section3.Qu: WHAT IS THE COST OF SHIPPING?
FrequentlyAskedQuestionsPage.Section3.An: Home deliveries are made by the Courier company in the areas that have an office / s at the place of shipment.
Shipping Cost by Courier is: For all shipments we offer the  special price of 3.5 € for weight up to 3 kg. For each bsequent kilo the charge is € 1 .
In cases of COD shipments, the charge at the basic price amounts to € 2.90 .
Bulk parcels are sent by transport company by arrangement. Cash on delivery is not valid for this shipping method. There will be telephone contact with you before shipment.
Orders placed by 14:00 (on business days) are shipped the same day and delivered in one to three business days ually 1 to 3 business days Monday - Friday).
You can order the products you want in 3 simple ways!
1. By registering an online order 24 hours a day at SFKshop.gr
2. Through the live chat that appears at the top of any page!
3. By phone order at 21064 21065 (from mobile * and landline)
Monday to Friday from 10:00 to 17:00 * (local charge)
In case you want to return the product you bought, you have the opportunity to do it in 2 ways within 7 calendar days  from the day you received it! (Prerequisite
that the product is in its sealed commercial package and is  accompanied by proof of purchase).
Sending it / s at your own expense, in its original  purchase receipt. more here
